techmeme.title: Source: the Google Pixel Watch 3 will come in 41mm and 45mm sizes, have smaller 4.5mm bezels, a brighter 2,000-nit display, and ultra-wideband support (Kamila Wojciechowska/Android Authority)
Skild AI, which is developing a foundational model for robotics, raised a $300M Series A at a $1.5B valuation led by Lightspeed, SoftBank, Coatue, Jeff Bezos (Rashi Shrivastava/Forbes)
A group of investors led by Vista Equity Partners has agreed to acquire a majority stake in Nasuni, valuing the hybrid cloud storage provider at ~$1.2B (Bloomberg)
A US judge dismisses more claims in a lawsuit brought by devs, who allege GitHub Copilot unlawfully copied their code; of 22 original claims, only two remain (Matthew Connatser/The Register)
Sources: xAI ends talks with Oracle to expand an existing arrangement to rent Nvidia chips; source: Oracle is not part of xAI's supercomputer project in Memphis (Anissa Gardizy/The Information)
